timeline.message:
Add a bunch of `final` keywords

... to the classes and methods we did not intend to allow extending or
overriding.

timeline.body:
IIUC, this class does not have `final` intentionally. From the discussion https://github.com/line/armeria/pull/2069#discussion_r325577213, another `Java1XVersionSpecific` could inherit `Java9VersionSpecific`.
/cc @anuraaga
timeline.bodyText:
IIUC, this class does not have final intentionally. From the discussion #2069 (comment), another Java1XVersionSpecific could inherit Java9VersionSpecific.
/cc @anuraaga
timeline.bodyHTML:
